text: -mA la#BEta praqjApa#tiqH sarvA# dEqvatA# dEqvatA$svEqva prati#tiShThatiq yadi# biBIqyAd-duqScarmA# BaviShyAqmIti# sOmApauqShNa(gg) SyAqmamA la#BEta sauqmyO vai dEqvata#yAq puru#ShaH pauqShNAH paqSavaqH svayaiqvAsmai# dEqvata#yA paqSuBiqstvaca#M karOtiq na duqScarmA# Bavati dEqvAScaq vai yaqmaScAqsmin ~MlOqkE$&sparddhantaq sa yaqmO dEqvAnA#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mayuvataq tadyaqmasya# - [  ]  23
